original_text: Yet she multiplied her whoredoms, in calling to remembrance the days of her youth, wherein she had played the harlot in the land of Egypt.
korean_text: 그가 그의 음행을 더하여 젊었을 때 곧 애굽 땅에서 행음하던 때를 생각하고

sentences.original_text: in calling to remembrance the days of her youth
wherein she had played the harlot
sentences.korean_translation: 그 안에서 그녀가 창녀 짓을 했었는데
